description: This notification is sent whenever the authentication system
status changes (up or down).

Summary.eval: ($v1 == 2) ? 'Authentication system is down due to $v2' : 'Authentication system is up'

description: Identifies the current status of the authentication system.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessStatus

description: Identifies the last cause of a status change. Mostly
used by the publicAccessStatusChanged trap.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessStatusChangedCause

description: This notification is sent whenever publicAccessUsersThreshold
is exceeded.

event.Summary: Public access users threshold reached: $v1 user are logged in

description: Indicates the number of currently authenticated users.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUsersCount

description: When a user successfully authenticate a trap is
generated if the publicAccessUsersSessionTrapEnabled is set to
True.

event.Summary: Authentication success for public access user $v1

description: Indicates the user's name.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserName

description: When a user terminates their session a trap is generated
if the publicAccessUsersSessionTrapEnabled is set to True.

event.Summary: Session terminated for public access user $v1

description: Indicates the user's name.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserName

description: When a user authentication fails a trap is generated
if the publicAccessUsersSessionTrapEnabled is set to True.

event.Summary: Authentication failed for public access user $v1

description: Indicates the user's name.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserName

description: This is sent when a user is authenticated or periodically
(see publicAccessUSersLoggedInTrapInterval)
if the publicAccessUsersLoggedInTrapEnabled is set to True.

event.Summary: User $v2 with IP address $v3 and MAC address $v4 has logged in

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUsersLoggedInTrap COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUsersCount u 9999 COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserName s EXAMPLE COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserStationIpAddress a 192.0.2.1 COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserStationMacAddress s EXAMPL COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserApMacAddress s EXAMPL COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserConnectedInterface s EXAMPLE COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserSessionDuration c 9999 COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserBytesReceived C 9999 COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserBytesSent C 9999

description: Indicates the number of currently authenticated users.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUsersCount

description: Indicates the user's name.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserName

description: Indicates the user's IP address.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserStationIpAddress

description: Indicates the user's MAC Address.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserStationMacAddress

description: Indicates the user's Access Point MAC Address when Location-
Aware is enabled or the Access Controller MAC Address.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserApMacAddress

description: Indicates the device's logical public interface to which
the user is connected. This will always be a string
containing 'br0'.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserConnectedInterface

description: Indicates how long the user's session has been active.
When this counter reaches its maximum value, it wraps
around and starts increasing again from zero.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserSessionDuration

description: Indicates the total number of bytes received by the user.
When this counter reaches its maximum value, it wraps
around and starts increasing again from zero.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserBytesReceived

description: Indicates the total number of bytes sent by the user.
When this counter reaches its maximum value, it wraps
around and starts increasing again from zero.
variables.name: COLUBRIS-PUBLIC-ACCESS-MIB::publicAccessUserBytesSent
